title: V for Vendetta
content:
So, anyone seen this movie yet? I just saw it yesterday and was really surprised how excellent it was in every aspect! When I went to the cinema I really didn't expect the movie to be above average Hollywood action movie. Thankfully I was proven wrong. The story was a lot deeper than usually, and wasn't that traditional either. It was also nice to see the main characters not ending up in the same bed as usually seems to happen. I recommend this movie to everyone. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopekeen.gif[/img] Gotta buy this one once it's released on dvd.

[url=http://www.vforvendetta.com/]www.vforvendetta.com/[/url]3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: V for Vendetta
content:
They haven't screened it here yet, so I probably have to wait a few weeks but I might go and see it.-----------------

title: Re: V for Vendetta
content:
Its by them Matrix fools... which kind of worries me...

To me, The Matrix was an excellent movie.... awesome in so many aspects. The sequals however... were terrible... I through up. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img]

So thats kind of putting me off for the moment. I do kind of want to see it though, because it does look sort of interesting and maybe they can pull off again what they accomplished with The Matrix.[img]http://www.denness.net/rpi/username/mr12000[/img]

title: Re: V for Vendetta
content:
Well, it's pretty different from the Matrix(es) and you wouldn't even guess it's scripted by the same Bros unless you hear the fact. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] It's directed by someone else. Again, I recommend..3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: V for Vendetta
content:
It's indeed a nice movie, it sometimes gave me the impression I was reading literature instead of watching a movie because of all the motives and symbols. Still I got the impression that they rushed the movie towards the end, that was a pity.-----------------
